hero.headline:
Same keywords,
different playbooks
hero.description: An e-commerce brand competing against Amazon faces nothing like a healthcare practice navigating YMYL. We build SEO strategies around your industry's search dynamics — not templates.

items.title: Industry search intent is unique
items.description: A 'best software' query in B2B means a buying committee with a 6-month cycle. In e-commerce, it means someone ready to purchase right now. Generic keyword strategies miss this entirely.

items.title: Compliance shapes strategy
items.description: Healthcare has YMYL. FinTech has regulatory disclaimers. SaaS has JavaScript rendering issues. Each vertical has constraints that reshape technical SEO, content strategy, and link building from the ground up.

items.title: Competition maps differ by sector
items.description: E-commerce competes against marketplaces. SaaS fights product-led comparison pages. Startups battle established brands with zero domain authority. Your SEO strategy must be built around who you're actually competing against.

approach.title: One methodology. Calibrated per vertical.
approach.intro: Every industry engagement follows our proven Autopilot framework — but the tactics, content types, and technical priorities are completely different for each sector.

steps.title: Industry audit
steps.description: Map your industry's search landscape: competitor analysis, SERP features, compliance requirements, and content gap opportunities specific to your vertical.

steps.title: Sector-specific roadmap
steps.description: 90-day plan calibrated to your industry dynamics. Healthcare needs E-E-A-T authority. E-commerce needs product schema. SaaS needs JavaScript rendering solutions.

steps.title: Vertical execution
steps.description: Content, technical SEO, and link building tailored to your sector's norms. We produce the types of content your industry's buyers actually search for.

steps.title: Outcome reporting
steps.description: Weekly showcases tied to your business KPIs — not vanity metrics. Pipeline attribution, revenue correlation, and market share tracking.

items.question: Why can't I use the same SEO strategy for every industry?
items.answer: Each industry has unique search intent patterns, compliance requirements, competitive dynamics, and content formats that perform best. A generic strategy ignores these differences and leaves significant traffic and revenue on the table.

items.question: How long until I see results from industry-specific SEO?
items.answer: Most clients see measurable organic traffic improvements within 90 days. The timeline depends on your current domain authority, competitive landscape, and industry-specific factors like content freshness requirements or compliance review cycles.

items.question: What industries do you work with?
items.answer: We have dedicated programs for E-Commerce, Healthcare, SaaS, Startups, B2B, and FinTech. We also build custom strategies for industries outside these verticals — book a call and we'll scope your specific needs.

items.question: Do you handle both SEO and AEO for industry-specific programs?
items.answer: Yes. Every industry program includes both traditional search engine optimization and AI engine optimization. We monitor your brand's visibility across Google, ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, and other AI platforms.
